thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Moody's Says Projects Are Managing Impact Of Carillion's Liquidation

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Moody's Says Projects Are Managing Impact Of Carillion's Liquidation
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Moody‘s:
* MOODY‘S - PROJECTS ARE MANAGING IMPACT OF CARILLION‘S LIQUIDATION, ALTHOUGH MODERATE CREDIT DETERIORATION IS POSSIBLE
* MOODY‘S ON CARILLION- MODERATE CREDIT DETERIORATION POSSIBLE AS SOME PROJECT COS WILL NEED TO SIGN NEW CONTRACTS WITH ALTERNATIVE SUBCONTRACTORS
* MOODY'S ON CARILLION- PROJECT COMPANIES COULD POTENTIALLY FACE INCREASED FM COSTS WITHOUT AN ACCOMPANYING INCREASE IN REVENUE Source text: bit.ly/2BiT7k5 Further company coverage:
